item.title: Criteria for Zettelkasten
item.description: Note retrieval: how fast and easy is full-text search? Note creation: does it take many clicks or keystrokes to create a new Zettel note? Note connections: which mechanisms does the app support to create connections? Data export: how does the application manage to get everything out without losing information? How does it manage to get stuff in? Related ยง2019-12-24-1216 zettelkasten External Links

item.title: Zettelkasten
item.description: Zettelkasten is a system, that is a toolkit and an application of a method. The Zettelkasten method consists of: Collect Process Cross-Reference and Use. There are three parts to a Zettelkasten: Inbox: fleeting notes Archive: the trusted place to look for information Reference Database: interface to the outside world When you are using the Zettelkasten tookit, you are creating a communication system, an external intelligence, between you and the Zettelkasten.
